epiviz: Data Visualisation Functions for Epidemiological Data Science Products

Source: R/epiviz-package.R
epiviz-package.Rd

Tools for making epidemiological reporting easier with consistent static and dynamic charts and maps.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/ukhsa-collaboration/epiviz

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/ukhsa-collaboration/epiviz/issues
